Function Documentation

void APS_Init ( void  )

Initialization internal state and main variables of APS-layer.

The function can be called only by ZDO. It must be called before any operation with APS.

Returns:
None.
void APS_ResetReq ( APS_ResetReq_t *const  req)

Resets APS to default state.

The function can be called only by ZDO and only after APS_Init().

Parameters:
[in]req- pointer to reset parameters.
Returns:
None.
void APS_StartReq ( APS_StartReq_t *const  req)

Makes APS allow processing of incoming packets.

After this function is called, APS is ready to process incoming packets.

Parameters:
[in]req- pointer to startup parameters.
Returns:
None.
void APS_StopReq ( APS_StopReq_t *const  req)

Makes APS disallow processing of incoming packets.

After this function is called, APS does not process incoming packets.

Parameters:
[in]req- pointer to stopping parameters.
Returns:
None.
bool APS_IsStarted ( void  )

Check if APS is started.

Returns:
'true' if APS is started otherwise return 'false'
bool APS_IsActiveTransaction ( void  )

Check if there are any active requests in progress.

Returns:
'true' if there are any active requests in progress otherwise - 'false'
void APS_HandleLeave ( NWK_LeaveControl_t *const  ctrl)

Resetting choosed tables.

Parameters:
[in]ctrl- set of flags to checking.
Returns:
None
void APS_ApsDataReqDeleteQueueElem ( APS_DataReq_t *  apsDataReq)

Delete the specified element in APS Data request queue.

Parameters:
[in]apsDataReq- element to be deleted
